text: Foxconn subsidiary plans to expand production in Vietnam, document shows. Fushan Technology, a subsidiary of Taiwanese electronics manufacturer Foxconn, is seeking a permit to expand production in Vietnam to make Xbox game consoles and other electronic parts, according to a company document sent to Bac Ninh province's environmental department.
label: positive

text: Allegiant Introduces Altus Sol: A First-of-Its-Kind Wine Crafted for an Elevated Experience at 30,000 Feet. Airline partners with Napa winemaker to launch bespoke wine on board its flights Click *Here* for Photos LAS VEGAS , Dec. 3, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Allegiant (NASDAQ: ALGT) is raising a toast to their customers with the launch of Altus Sol, a custom-crafted wine developed in partnership with Sonoma Bespoke, a Napa-based winemaker. Allegiant becomes the first airline to introduce a wine designed from the ground up, elevating the inflight experience.
label: positive

text: Manganese X Energy Corp. Kicks Off Battery Hill Prefeasibility Study, Selecting ABH Engineering Inc. and GEMTEC Consulting Engineering and Scientists Limited. text: Correction: Vantage Drilling International Ltd. – Key information relating to the cash dividend to be paid. Dubai, Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The board of directors of Vantage Drilling International Ltd. on 1 December 2025 resolved to distribute a dividend. The key dates have been corrected as summarised below. The shares will trade inclusive of the right to dividend up to and including 16 December 2025 (as recorded in the Norwegian Central Securities Depository (VPS) on 18 December 2025), with the first day of trading exclusive of the right to dividend on 17 December 2025.

text: Core & Main: Real Demand Is Steady; The Narrative Just Hasn't Caught Up. Core & Main is evolving from a cyclical water pipe distributor to a stable, essential infrastructure platform with robust, recurring demand drivers. CNM's growth is fueled by aging water infrastructure, regulatory upgrades, climate adaptation, and municipal investments, making its outlook less tied to construction cycles. Despite recent margin compression from residential weakness, CNM's margins are expected to stabilize and gradually improve as volumes normalize and operational efficiencies increase.

text: AUD/USD and AUD/JPY both eye breakouts after hawkish RBA remarks. text: Oracle: Ignore The Market Noise And Buy The Dip Going Into Earnings. text: NZF: Too Much Return Of Capital To Be Sustainable. Nuveen Municipal Credit Income Fund offers a higher yield by taking on both credit and interest rate risk, typical for municipal bond funds. NZF's headline of 7.5% yield is inflated by return of capital; the real, sustainable yield is closer to 4.9% after adjustment. Compared to peers, NZF's risk-return profile is decent, but funds like NMZ and SHYM may offer better risk-adjusted returns by focusing more on credit risk.
